title: Kwaku Boateng (high jumper)
text: Kwaku Boateng (born 30 June 1974 in <a href="Eastmont%2C%20Ghana">Eastmont</a>, <a href="Ghana">Ghana</a>) is a <a href="Canadians">Canadian</a> <a href="high%20jump">high jump</a>er. His personal best jump is 2.34 metres, achieved in July 2000 in Zagreb. Boateng competed representing <a href="Ghana">Ghana</a> from 1993 to 1996. From January 1997 he has competed for Canada. His hometown is <a href="Montreal%2C%20Quebec">Montreal, Quebec</a>. Boateng is father to Tristan Boateng, a basketball player (Class of 2025) attending <a href="Bill%20Crothers%20Secondary%20School">Bill Crothers Secondary School</a> in Markham, Ontario.
